"Earn money as an &appname; host" "From saving for home repairs to taking a dream trip, hosts use extra income to fund their passions." "What’s in a listing?" "You’ll fill out a description, take and upload photos, and pick a price. Your listing helps guests get a sense of what your place is like." "Who can book" "You set the rules for who stays and when. Booking and guest preferences help hosting fit into your lifestyle." "We’re here to help" "&appname; provides tips and help along the way. From getting your home ready to choosing a price—we’ve got tools for you."
"Notifications" "Payout Methods" Terms of Service
"Payouts" "Set up your &appname; payout method"
Your payout is what you earn from hosting a guest. Payouts are sent 14 days after each check-out. "Learn more about payouts" "Address of Payout" Submit "PayPal Email ID" Add Payout Method Delete "Are you sure you want to \n delete " Default Make Default

"Other"
"Cancellation policy" "Strict" "50% refund up until 1 week prior to arrival, except fees
\nCleaning fees are always refunded if the guest did not check in. \nThe &appname; service fee is non-refundable. \nIf there is a complaint from either party, notice must be given to &appname; within 24 hours of check-in. \n&appname; will mediate when necessary, and has the final say in all disputes. \nA reservation is officially canceled when the guest clicks the cancellation button on the cancellation confirmation page, which they can find in Dashboard > Your Trips > Change or Cancel. \nCancellation policies may be superseded by the Guest Refund Policy, safety cancellations, or extenuating circumstances. Please review these exceptions. \nApplicable taxes will be retained and remitted."
"Moderate" "Full refund 5 days prior to arrival, except fees
\nCleaning fees are always refunded if the guest did not check in. \nThe &appname; service fee is non-refundable. \nIf there is a complaint from either party, notice must be given to &appname; within 24 hours of check-in. \n&appname; will mediate when necessary, and has the final say in all disputes. \nA reservation is officially canceled when the guest clicks the cancellation button on the cancellation confirmation page, which they can find in Dashboard > Your Trips > Change or Cancel. \nCancellation policies may be superseded by the Guest Refund Policy, safety cancellations, or extenuating circumstances. Please review these exceptions. \nApplicable taxes will be retained and remitted."
"Flexible" "Full refund 1 day prior to arrival, except fees
\nCleaning fees are always refunded if the guest did not check in. \nThe &appname; service fee is non-refundable. \nIf there is a complaint from either party, notice must be given to &appname; within 24 hours of check-in. \n&appname; will mediate when necessary, and has the final say in all disputes. \nA reservation is officially canceled when the guest clicks the cancellation button on the cancellation confirmation page, which they can find in Dashboard > Your Trips > Change or Cancel. \nCancellation policies may be superseded by the Guest Refund Policy, safety cancellations, or extenuating circumstances. Please review these exceptions. \nApplicable taxes will be retained and remitted."

Experience cancellation policy Guest requirements Group size up to See dates Who can come 1 Rooms 1 Experiences Hosted by read more Bed Type "Select your bed types and count..." Lenght of stay discounts Early bird discounts Last min discounts Reservation Settings ADD Select nights Percentage Last Minute Discounts Add a requirement for seasons or weekends Start date End date Select Dates Custom Select Custom Dates The Select Date field is required Homes Home Experiences Experience Change your wishlist title here OK Cancel There are spots available on this experience. Group size From the host Alcohol Bringing guests under 18 Guests ages Any experience or event cancellation that is 30 days or more before the start date, is eligible for a full refund. Cancellations less than 30 days before start date will not be eligible for a refund, unless your spot is booked and completed by another guest. Should your spot be booked and completed by another guest, a full refund will be processed within 14 days of the experience start date. However, if your reason for cancellation meets our Extenuating Circumstances policy, you will be refunded in full. Should any member of your party be unable to complete the account verification process within 3 days of purchase, all portions and spots for the experience or event will be canceled and fully refunded. Account Verification Weather Hosts make every effort to continue, as scheduled, with experiences or events. Should bad weather conditions create an unsafe scenario for guests or hosts, a change or partial cancellation of an itinerary or activity may be the result. Should an individual experience or event be canceled by host or guest, or should an itinerary substantially change or result in a cessation of the trip, Makent will work with your host to provide an appropriate refund. To officially request a cancellation of your experience or event, please contact us. General Cancellation Send Message Need more info about If you have general questions about how experiences work, visit our FAQ Who\'s coming? Edit Guest Keep your guests in the loop. Add their email and we\'ll send them the itineary. Time already taken Help Travelers Find the Right Fit People searching on Makent Space can filter by listing basics to find a space that matches their needs. How can guests access your space * What type of space do you have? * Sq ft Acres Additional information about services, packages and rates: What services and extras do you offer? Street, City, State, Country Apt #, Floor #, etc. What is the full address of your space? House name/number + street/road Share any special instructions needed for organizers to access the space. e.g. door lock code, on-site manager. This information will only be shared upon booking confirmation. What amenities does your space offer? Check-In Guidance Choose on Map Pricing Hourly Rate: Full Day Price: Minimum booking hours: Services Offered Other Services Special Features Space Style Event Type Maximum number of guests * Photos Can Bring Your Space to Life Add photos of areas guests have access to. You can always come back later and add more. What are the highlights of this photo? Add Photos The style of your space can be described as %s, tell us about your space The more you share, the faster you can get a booking Your listing is 0% done. Space details, guests 2. Setup 1. Set your Space Rules Tell Travelers About Your Space Every space on Makent Space is unique. Highlight what makes your listing welcoming so that it stands out to guests who want to stay in your area. Listing Name The Space Be clear and descriptive Tell travelers what you love about the space . You can include details about the decor the amenities it includes, and the neighborhood. You can add more information about what makes your space unique. Let travelers know if there are other details that will impact their stay. Translate To English Show Original text Weekly Rate Monthly Rate Need to make a change? %s Last step to complete %s Last steps to complete MakentSpace, we’re almost done. Ready to place your space in the spotlight? People all over the country are searching for a space like yours! When they use &appname; to find you, they’ll have the option to filter search results by listing basic information to find a match. By carefully completing the questions in this section, you can help them achieve their goals and, in turn, maximize your chances of being found! Let’s get down to business. Please complete the following information as accurately as possible to help people find your space. Is your space fully furnished? * How many working stations are available in your space? * Are your working stations/desks shared or private? * Shared Private Have you ever hosted your venue with a website like &appname; before? * No, I’m new to all this! Yes, I’m experienced with space hosting. How big is your space (in square feet)? * Lets get started listing your space People searching on &appname; can filter by listing basics to find a space that matches their needs. Address Line #2: ** Note: Please mark your exact geo location in map Approved Request Booking Send to Host
Delete Account Account deleted successfully Confirm All your trips, reservation, transaction history, listing will be deleted permanently Your pending payout or refund is yet to be collected. Are you sure you want to delete this account? Oh No! This is annoying - Sorry for the inconvenience! This could because The user you’re looking for is deleted The room you’re looking for is deleted For more Information, Kindly contact admin.
